curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 국가가 당신을 위해 무엇을 할 수 있는지 묻지 마시오.
curriculum.english: Ask not what your country can do for you.

grammarTip.title: Rhetorical Devices
grammarTip.explanation: 수사법은 설득력을 높이는 언어의 기교입니다. 대조(Antithesis), 반복(Repetition) 등을 사용해보세요.
examples: Ask not what X, ask what Y.
To be or not to be.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 나에게는 언젠가 이 나라가 일어설 것이라는 꿈이 있습니다.
curriculum.english: I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up.

chunks.text: that one day this nation will rise up

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: To be, or not to be, that is the question.

chunks.text: To be, or not to be

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: We shall fight on the beaches.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Veni, vidi, vici.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Love is patient, love is kind.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 국민의, 국민에 의한, 국민을 위한 정부.
curriculum.english: Government of the people, by the people, for the people.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Stay hungry, stay foolish.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 그가 지켜보고 있었다는 것을 나는 꿈에도 몰랐다.
curriculum.english: Little did I know that he was watching.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 나는 그런 아름다움을 거의 본 적이 없다.
curriculum.english: Rarely have I seen such beauty.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 해가 질 때까지 우리는 멈추지 않았다.
curriculum.english: Not until the sun set did we stop.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 어떤 상황에서도 이 문을 열지 마라.
curriculum.english: Under no circumstances should you open this door.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Only then did I understand the truth.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 그녀는 너무 화가 나서 즉시 떠났다.
curriculum.english: So angry was she that she left immediately.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 내 평생 이렇게 자유로운 적이 없었다.
curriculum.english: Never in my life have I felt so free.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Had I known, I would have come.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Whatever you do, do it well.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Truly remarkable is his talent.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 내가 너라면, 그 제안을 받아들일 거야.
curriculum.english: If I were you, I would accept the offer.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 새처럼 날 수 있다면 좋을 텐데.
curriculum.english: I wish I could fly like a bird.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 그는 마치 모든 것을 아는 것처럼 말한다.
curriculum.english: He talks as if he knows everything.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 네 도움이 없었다면, 나는 실패했을 거야.
curriculum.english: Without your help, I would have failed.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: If only I had more time.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 무슨 일이 있어도, 너와 함께 있을게.
curriculum.english: Whatever happens, I will stay with you.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Even if it rains, we will go.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Suppose you won the lottery.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 혹시 그를 보면, 나에게 전화하라고 해줘.
curriculum.english: Should you see him, tell him to call me.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: It is high time we took action.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 따라서, 우리는 그가 유죄라고 결론지어야 한다.
curriculum.english: Therefore, we must conclude that he is guilty.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Furthermore, the cost is too high.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 그럼에도 불구하고, 나는 내 일을 계속할 것이다.
curriculum.english: Nevertheless, I will continue my work.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Consequently, the project was cancelled.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: In contrast, she prefers tea over coffee.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Generally speaking, cats are independent.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: In other words, it is impossible.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.korean: 이러한 이유로, 나는 참석할 수 없다.
curriculum.english: For this reason, I cannot attend.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Due to the rain, the game ended early.

curriculum.question: The Art of Persuasion
curriculum.english: Despite the difficulties, they succeeded.

curriculum.question: Review
curriculum.english: Despite the difficulties, they succeeded.
